Text: Super Bowl Square Poolsgo out to the New England Patriots and the St Louis Rams for earning a trip Super Bowl XXXVI It should be a good game despite what the odds makers are saying which is St Louis to win by points New England keeps surprising and I expect them to make it a closer game than people think Im writing to tell you about the Super Bowl Square Pools on OFP Square pools are the x grid pools that you often see for the Super Bowl I always run a square pool on OFP during our Super Bowl party I set up the pool and then people who are OFP members can log in and enter their own picks even if they arent at the party and for everyone else I create an Alias for them and enter their picks that way Its super easy and it makes for a fun time and an exciting game even if your team isnt winning You can start your Square Pool now and see how it works and get things set up Then if you like the format and want to proceed with the pool Square Pools cost only less than cents per square Start your square pool now jumptocfmid I also wanted to tell you about our NCAA Basketball Tournament Pool site called wwwtournamentpoolscom Ive been working hard to get Tournament Pools up and running for the season Theres a slick new javascript picksheet and other great improvements If you liked Tournament Pools last year youll love it this year Look for my announcement next week saying that Tournament Pools is open I hope you have a great Super Bowl and if you dont run a Square Pool I hope to see you for basketball at TournamentPoolscom Good luck John This mail was sent to MIKE NRONCOM We sent this email to to everyone in the officefootballpoolcomtournamentpoolscom database We only send or mailings like this per year but if you wish to be removed from our database please send a reply to this email with the word remove in the subject line Also please include the full text of this email in your reply
